_source.text: [67] Of the writers who feature most prominently in The Arcades Project , Baudelaire, despite his call on artists to embrace the modern, openly repudiated " la loi fatale, irrésistible du progrès " ["the fatal and irresistible law of progress"], seeing it as no better than a " grande héresie " [an "enormous heresy"].

text: call on artists to embrace **the** **modern**, openly repudiated " **la** loi fatale, irrésistible du progrès
" ["the fatal and irresistible law of progress"], seeing it as no **better** **than** a " grande héresie " [an "enormous heresy"].
